name: HAUNTING REVENANT
condition_immunities: Charmed, Exhaustion, Frightened, Grappled, Paralyzed, Petrified, Poisoned, Prone, Restrained, Unconscious

traits.name: Haunted Zone
traits.text: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 17, any creature that casts a spell while inside the revenant's space. Failure: The spell fails and is wasted.

traits.name: Undead Restoration
traits.text: If the revenant dies, it revives 24 hours later unless Dispel Evil and Good is cast on its remains. If it revives, it animates another Gargantuan object or structure elsewhere on the same plane of existence; it now looks different but uses the same stat block and returns with all its Hit Points.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The revenant makes two Object Slam attacks and uses Invitation.

actions.name: Object Slam
actions.text: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: +9 (with Advantage if the target is inside the revenant's space), reach 10 ft. or range 30/90 ft. Hit: 27 (5d8 + 5) Bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Invitation
actions.text: Charisma Saving Throw: DC 17, each creature in a 60-foot Cone. Failure: The target is teleported inside the revenant's space and swallowed. A swallowed creature has Total Cover against attacks and other effects outside the revenant. While the revenant has Hit Points, a swallowed creature can leave the revenant's space only by using magic that enables planar travel, such as the Plane Shift spell.
